name: Georifters
summary: The ground is your weapon in the fast paced battle arena of Georifters. Team up with or against your friends to punch portals, twist tunnels, flip lasers, and steal the ground from under each other using a unique arsenal of weapons and abilities in this ground busting adventure.
info:
• 中文名: 移探救境
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 平台: Switch
  • 游戏类型: Platformer
  • 游玩人数: 1 - 4人
  • 发行日期: 2020-05-29
  • 官方网站: https://www.georifters.com
  • 开发: Busy Toaster
  • 发行: Busy Toaster
